name: E-be soft
description:
E-be soft  

it's a 2D platform game in a Steam-punk universe where we play "E-be" a little android who can change the gravitation around him.

Controle :
  • If you play with a keyboard
    • QD  to move
    •  Arrows to change gravity
    • E to interact with an object
    • S to smash enemy
    • ECHAP to pause the game
Credits!

 Léo NIMSGERN- Programmer & GD
